snippet: The University of California, Los Angeles recently sent e-mails to 894 wait-listed students that caused many to believe that they had been accepted. They had not.
abstract: The University of California, Los Angeles recently sent e-mails to 894 wait-listed students that caused many to believe that they had been accepted. They had not.

headline.main: U.C.L.A. Apologizes After Mistakenly Congratulating 894 Students on Acceptance
